TASK.TITLE: Unfixed bugs

TextGraphics do not update the plot if it changes
PLS analysis: The provided maximum number of factors is ignored.
Logarithmic plotting, so that there are 3 decades per major tick, the minor ticks are not plotted right

20050428 Interesting behaviour when logarithmic scale and if only one point is really positive (tested it with 0;0 and 1000;1000, on rescaling the axis becomes mirrored (going from higher values to lower values)
No ticks if only one data point is plotted (linear axes)
Fixed bugs but untested
Fixed bugs

28.04.05 20050428 BinaryMath members are nonstatic

10.12.05 If adding plot data to a linked layer, that layers axis are rescaled, but is should not be the case, because it is straightly linked!
10.12.05 PlotRange did not work, the plot curve is not drawn if you enter a plot range begin
